error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'num_dogs_walked' (20) was used instead of 'charge_per_block' (1.25).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 8
Jules has to earn $200 because 1000 / 5 = <<1000/5=200>>200
He has earned $40 from starting the walks because 20 x 2 = <<20*2=40>>40
He has to earn $160 from distance, because 200 - 40 = <<200-40=160>>160
He has to walk 8 blocks because 160 / 20 = <<160/20=8>>8
